annotation.spannedText: The chickenpox vaccine is a shot that can protect nearly anyone who receives the vaccine from catching chickenpox

classMention.mentionClass: The chickenpox vaccine is a shot that can protect nearly anyone who receives the vaccine from catching chickenpox

annotation.spannedText: There's another reason for getting a shot for chickenpox

classMention.mentionClass: There's another reason for getting a shot for chickenpox

annotation.spannedText: children with chickenpox need to be kept out of school or day care for about a week or more until all blisters have dried and crusted over

classMention.mentionClass: children with chickenpox need to be kept out of school or day care for about a week or more until all blisters have dried and crusted over

annotation.spannedText: A child should have the first shot at ages 12-18 months

classMention.mentionClass: A child should have the first shot at ages 12-18 months

annotation.spannedText: The second shot should be given at ages 4-6 years

classMention.mentionClass: The second shot should be given at ages 4-6 years

annotation.spannedText: Older children and adults should have two shots, with four to eight weeks between the first and second shot

classMention.mentionClass: Older children and adults should have two shots, with four to eight weeks between the first and second shot

annotation.spannedText: the side effects associated with the varicella vaccine are generally mild

classMention.mentionClass: the side effects associated with the varicella vaccine are generally mild

annotation.spannedText: Severe side effects are very rare

classMention.mentionClass: Severe side effects are very rare

annotation.spannedText: Anyone who is moderately to severely ill when a chickenpox shot is scheduled should wait until the illness passes before getting the shot

classMention.mentionClass: Anyone who is moderately to severely ill when a chickenpox shot is scheduled should wait until the illness passes before getting the shot

annotation.spannedText: anyone who had an allergic reaction to the first shot should not get the second shot

classMention.mentionClass: anyone who had an allergic reaction to the first shot should not get the second shot

annotation.spannedText: Other people who should not get the shot include

classMention.mentionClass: Other people who should not get the shot include

annotation.spannedText: it's important to keep in mind that up to 90% of the people who get the vaccine will not catch chickenpox.

classMention.mentionClass: it's important to keep in mind that up to 90% of the people who get the vaccine will not catch chickenpox.
